response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value and potential for growth, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Given its significance, I propose a purchase price of $950,000 for this exceptional product. This figure reflects not only its current worth but also the potential returns it can generate for you in the future. I look forward to discussing the details further and understanding how we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.", "product_price": 950000}
